scheme_name: Award of Pre-matric Scholarship to the Students Whose Parents Are Engaged in Unclean Occupation
description: The scheme provides scholarships to the students whose parents are engaged in unclean occupation (scavenger, Flayers & Tarner) to improve the status of the unprivileged society. The scheme provides scholarships irrespective of income and caste.
eligibility: The applicant should be from a Scheduled Caste.
The applicant should be a Student.
The applicant should be studying in Class 1st to Class 10th.
The applicant should be a Native/Resident of the Union Territory of Puducherry.
Either or both the parents of the applicant should be engaged in unclean occupation (Scavenger/ Flayer/ Tarner).
documents: Residence-cum-nativity Certificate, issued by the competent authority.
Certificate of Unclean Occupation Obtained From the Employer by the Parent/s.
